entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 08:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: WNW 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
